name: Protector Bot
description:
Endless Shoot 'em up space game, where you play as The Protector Bot who needs to protect something that is behind the screen. Kill multiple types of enemy's, collect power ups and every three waves kill a big and scary boss.

Controls:

Fly - wasd.

Shoot - s p a c e.

Dash - LShift.

Shoot rocket = LControl.

Fullscreen - F11

(More enemy's, bosses, power ups and features will be added if the game is popular enough)
